question: Are you allowed to read the same sura, same ayaats twice in the same Salaah?
answer:
QUESTION

in salah if u make a mistake and read sura Naas in eg. ur 1st raakat, then in ur 2nd rakaat should u restart the Quraan again and read sura baqara or should you read sura naas again? also are you alllowed to read the same sura, same ayaats twice in the same salaah?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allāh, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

 Assalāmu ῾alaykum wa Rahmatullāhi Wabarakātuh

 

 

If a person reads surah naas in the first raka’at, then in the second raka’at he should recite surah naas as well, so long as he is not making a khatam (completion) of the Qur’an. If he is making a khatam then he should recite from surah baqarah in the second raka’at.

 

It will be permissible to read the the same surah or aayat twice in the same salaah, however to do so unnecessarily is disliked (Makruh Tanzeehi). If it is done unintentionally or forgetfully, there is no harm in this. One should always remember that the surahs should be recited according to the same order of the Qur’an as this is the most preferable.

 

(Raddul Muhtaar, Vol 1, Pg 546 H M Saeed)[1]

(An Nahrul Faa’iq, Vol 1, Pg 237, Qadeemi)

 (Fataawa Mahmudiyyah, Vol 7, Pg 90-96, Faruqiyah)

(Bahishti Zewar, Pg 141, Zam Zam)

 

 

And Allāh Ta῾āla Knows Best

Wassalāmu ῾alaykum 

 

Ml. Ebrahim Desai,
Student Dārul Iftā

 

Checked and Approved by:

Mufti Ebrahim Desai

[1] لا بأس أن يقرأ سورة ويعيدها في الثانية، وأن يقرأ في الاولى من محل وفي الثانية من آخر ولو من سورة إن كان بينهما آيتان فأكثر... أفاد أنه يكره تنزيها........هذا أذا لم يضطر, فأن اضطر بأن قرأ في الاولي (قل أعوذ برب الناس) أعادها في الثانية أن لم يختم, نهر, لأن التكرار أهون من القراءة منكوسا, بزازية.
